# Risk & Compliance â€“ Audit Requirements

## Audit Expectations
- All risk and compliance decisions must be auditable.
- Decision rationale must be preserved.
- Historical audit reconstruction must be possible.

## Control Evidence
- Inputs, outputs, and decisions must be logged.
- Logs must be immutable and time-ordered.

## Forbidden
- Deleting audit evidence
- Modifying audit records
- Unattributed decision outcomes
